name: Recipe
instructions: Peel the potatoes and cut them into 2cm cubes. Add sufficient
salt and deep fry them until golden brown. In a bowl, combine
sliced onions, crushed red chilies, chili powder, turmeric powder,
curry leaves, cinnamon, 1/2 tsp salt, and mix well. Heat 1 tsp (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
cooking oil in a pan, then add mustard seeds and when it starts
to splatter add 2 or 3 dried whole red chilies. Let it fry for a
few seconds and then add the onion mixture to it. Stir fry until
golden brown. Finally add the fried potato cubes, mix well and
